description:
Our apartment is within walking distance to Columbia University, Central Park, A,B,C,D, 2 & 3 Subway stations, Red Rooster Harlem .  This apartment is well suited for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

You can contact us throughout your stay and we will be able to help you quickly with your needs in the apartment, how to get around the city and restaurant recommendations.

The A,B,C, D, 2 & 3  125th Street Subway stops are very nearby.  The M10, M2, and M3 buses also stop nearby.
name: 1 Bedroom Apartment on tree-lined street
review: Jeffrey was nice & easy to deal with. In regards to his place. Our review would be a low 3 out of 5. It lacked basic amenities, cleanliness & a place that looked like it isn't care for much. Basically a place to sleep. We gave our thoughts on how he could inexpensively and quickly improve his apt to help & get better reviews in the future. Hopefully he will.
